definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
Ericaceae (botany), genus containing rhododendron and azalea

sentences.english: Luoyang Peony under no everywhere, an air plug rhododendrons.
sentences.chinese: 洛下牡丹無處處，一枝空插杜鵑花。

sentences.english: China is the origin and distribution center of rhododendrons.
sentences.chinese: 我國是杜鵑花的發源地和分佈中心。

sentences.english: They are often used as a backdrop for rhododendrons, azaleas, or other spring-flowering shrubs.
sentences.chinese: 通常作爲杜鵑花和其他春季開花灌木的點綴和背景。

sentences.english: Later that evening, I began pulling weeds from around my lopsided azalea bush.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，我在那叢不對稱的杜鵑花叢旁邊拔除野草。

sentences.english: New taxa of Rhododendron subsection Lapponica from China.
sentences.chinese: 中國杜鵑花屬高山杜鵑亞組新分類羣。

sentences.english: Later that evening, I began pulling weeds from around my lopsided azalea bush.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，我正在爲向一邊傾斜的杜鵑花叢清理雜草。

sentences.english: Blooming azaleas in Luofeng Mountain, Zhangjiajie City.
sentences.chinese: 張家界羅峯山盛開的杜鵑花。

sentences.english: I always wanted a rhododendron bush planted just there.
sentences.chinese: 我一直以來都想在那裏栽一叢杜鵑花。

sentences.english: The valley was carpeted with azalea blossoms.
Several of these rhododendrons will flower this year for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 這些杜鵑花有些將在今年首度開花。

sentences.english: Title Pollen grain morphology in the Ericaceae.
sentences.chinese: 杜鵑花科花粉粒之形態。

sentences.english: A study on the genus Rhododendron L. subsection Neriiflora Sleumer in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國杜鵑花屬火紅杜鵑花亞組的研究。

sentences.english: A study on the genus Rhododendron L. subsection Neriiflora Sleumer in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國杜鵑花屬火紅杜鵑花亞組的研究。

sentences.english: There are bright red azaleas here and there.
sentences.chinese: 到處是紅豔豔的杜鵑花。

sentences.english: However flowering plants such as azaleas and cyclamen like cooler temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 有些開花植物像杜鵑花和櫻草都喜歡較低的溫度。

definition: cuckoo (Cercococcyx spp., also written 杜鵑鳥|杜鹃鸟)/Indian azalea (Rhododendron simsii Planch, also written 杜鵑花|杜鹃花)
thousands of purples and reds (idiom); a blaze of color/fig. a profusion of flourishing trades
tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
